overview: Chris offered to spend the morning at his friend Aslan’s place to fix his blinds. When Aslan’s girlfriend leaves for the day, Chris ends up helping Aslan in more ways than one. Tomm’s girlfriend is suspicious of her boyfriend’s relationship with Andy, so she decides to spy on them. Once she catches them in bed together, her suspicions about his sexuality turn out to be right! Nikolaj’s girlfriend is hearing rumors about his sexual orientation. She decides to take matters into her own hands and spies on him while he hangs out with friend Yuri. The rumors turn out to be true! Nick brings Travis home and is delighted to find his girlfriend asleep so they can fool around. Their moaning wakes her up, and she is in for a huge surprise!
title: My Boyfriend Is Gay 12
